helpdesk_ticket.description:
Dear Team,

I am writing to formally raise a complaint regarding the incorrect MRP
charged on my recent order.

Order ID: 658376297523609600
Product: Aptamil Stage 2
MRP Charged: ₹1080

As per the official notification from the manufacturer (Danone), following
the GST revision effective September 2025, the official MRP of Aptamil
Stage 2 has been revised to ₹960. This is publicly available and can be
verified here (sharing a screenshot as well):
https://urldefense.com/v3/__https://www.danone.in/new-mrp/__;!!PUkdKKdW7rI!ZddcDPnQg_pIseiV7kEo1eM0ndEACSGZ9b1YNiIoY4-g0XFfEMx69eLT4jJ1rYbjAfpMNmf6_kat1KkpEmUjukM$ 

I want to highlight that I have placed three prior orders for the same
product in the last 2–3 months:
• 649088586460315648
• 634326695861919744
• 634048639438139392

In each case, although your website displayed the old MRP of ₹1080, the
excess amount was automatically refunded, reflecting the revised official
MRP.

However, in this instance, no such refund has been processed, and I have
been charged the incorrect and outdated MRP of ₹1080, which is ₹120 higher
than the legally permitted MRP.

I understand that boxes currently in circulation may still carry the old
printed MRP of ₹1080 due to the timing of the GST change. However,
retailers are legally obligated to charge no more than the official MRP set
by the manufacturer, irrespective of printed packaging. This has already
been implemented across other retail platforms as well.

Charging above the official MRP constitutes overcharging and is not
permissible under consumer protection laws.

I request that:
1. Your team immediately reviews this issue, and
2. The excess amount of ₹120 is refunded without delay.

If this matter is not resolved promptly, I will be compelled to escalate
this formally, including approaching the appropriate consumer grievance and
legal forums, as charging above MRP is a serious compliance issue.

Please treat this as urgent and confirm the resolution at the earliest.
[image: image.png]

Thanks,
Mayank

--

helpdesk_ticket.subject: Incorrect MRP on my order
helpdesk_ticket.description_html:
Dear Team,

I am writing to formally raise a complaint regarding the incorrect MRP charged on my recent order.

Order ID: 658376297523609600
Product: Aptamil Stage 2
MRP Charged: ₹1080

As per the official notification from the manufacturer (Danone), following the GST revision effective September 2025, the official MRP of Aptamil Stage 2 has been revised to ₹960. This is publicly available and can be verified here (sharing a screenshot as well):
https://www.danone.in/new-mrp/

I want to highlight that I have placed three prior orders for the same product in the last 2–3 months:
• 649088586460315648
• 634326695861919744
• 634048639438139392

In each case, although your website displayed the old MRP of ₹1080, the excess amount was automatically refunded, reflecting the revised official MRP.

However, in this instance, no such refund has been processed, and I have been charged the incorrect and outdated MRP of ₹1080, which is ₹120 higher than the legally permitted MRP.

I understand that boxes currently in circulation may still carry the old printed MRP of ₹1080 due to the timing of the GST change. However, retailers are legally obligated to charge no more than the official MRP set by the manufacturer, irrespective of printed packaging. This has already been implemented across other retail platforms as well.

Charging above the official MRP constitutes overcharging and is not permissible under consumer protection laws.

I request that:
1. Your team immediately reviews this issue, and
2. The excess amount of ₹120 is refunded without delay.

If this matter is not resolved promptly, I will be compelled to escalate this formally, including approaching the appropriate consumer grievance and legal forums, as charging above MRP is a serious compliance issue.

Please treat this as urgent and confirm the resolution at the earliest.


Thanks,
Mayank

notes.body: ​Hello Mayank,     Greetings from PharmEasy!    A refund of Rs. 583.35 has been initiated to your account. Post initiation, the refund will be credited to your source account within 5-7 business days. Please note that Saturday, Sunday, and bank holidays are not included in this. Your patience is highly appreciated in the meantime.     In the future, please contact our Level 1 customer service team via a call to 8071324888 or send an email to care@pharmeasy.in. If your query remains unresolved for 7 days after you have reached out to our Level 1 Customer support, you can escalate the matter to us.      For any further assistance, please reach out to us through our support channels on the app or website listed in the "Need Help" section.  Thank you for choosing PharmEasy. Stay Safe.  Regards, Grievance Officer HelpDesk.
notes.body_html:
​Hello Mayank,

Greetings from PharmEasy!

A refund of Rs. 583.35 has been initiated to your account. Post initiation, the refund will be credited to your source account within 5-7 business days. Please note that Saturday, Sunday, and bank holidays are not included in this. Your patience is highly appreciated in the meantime.

In the future, please contact our Level 1 customer service team via a call to 8071324888 or send an email to care@pharmeasy.in. If your query remains unresolved for 7 days after you have reached out to our Level 1 Customer support, you can escalate the matter to us. 

For any further assistance, please reach out to us through our support channels on the app or website listed in the "Need Help" section.

Thank you for choosing PharmEasy. Stay Safe.

Regards,
Grievance Officer HelpDesk.

notes.body: Hello Kamlesh,     Greetings from PharmEasy!     I understand your query is related to the incorrect price charged for THREPTIN NUTRITION DISKETTES TIN OF 1 KG in your order #656824491984097280-13061. Please accept my sincere apologies for the inconvenience caused.   I am highlighting the issue to our escalations team and will request them to check. Once the issue is verified, we will try to initiate a refund for the difference amount. You can expect an update within 24 - 48 hours. We will inform you of the status once we receive an update from our team.   Also, once the refund is initiated it would reflect in your payments source within 5 - 7 working days.   I request your patience in the meantime.   Regards,     Neeha
notes.body_html:
Hello Kamlesh,

Greetings from PharmEasy!

I understand your query is related to the incorrect price charged for THREPTIN NUTRITION DISKETTES TIN OF 1 KG in your order #656824491984097280-13061. Please accept my sincere apologies for the inconvenience caused.

I am highlighting the issue to our escalations team and will request them to check. Once the issue is verified, we will try to initiate a refund for the difference amount. You can expect an update within 24 - 48 hours. We will inform you of the status once we receive an update from our team.

Also, once the refund is initiated it would reflect in your payments source within 5 - 7 working days.

I request your patience in the meantime.

Regards,

We also tried calling on the number 8908684487; however, the call gets disconnected after 1 ring, which means our number is auto-disconnected, as it may be marked as spam.      As checked, the committed date of delivery for Order #655409774291820544-12605 was 08.12.2025; however, the same was delivered on 06.12.2025. We can see that a return request has been raised by you. The item will be picked up within 48 hours. Once the item is picked, it will be verified within 5 working days. Post verification, the refund will be credited to your source account within 5-7 business days.      Please return only the items for which the request is raised. Item(s) that are opened, partially used, or disfigured are not eligible for returns. Items being returned should be in their original manufacturer’s packaging with labels and barcode intact.      Your patience is highly appreciated in the meantime.  For any further assistance, please reach out to us through our support channels on the app or website listed in the "Need Help" section.  Thank you for choosing PharmEasy. Stay Safe.  Regards, PharmEasy

Hello Darshan,

Greetings from PharmEasy!

With regards to your order #658084367322386432-50685, as checked due to some unforeseen circumstances, the order was not delivered to you by the expected date of delivery. Please accept my apologies for the same.

As per the records, your order is delivered to you on 12th December 2025. We have jotted down the details of your experience and PharmEasy will ensure all appropriate actions are taken to prevent similar situations from happening in the future. 

We look forward to having an opportunity to serve you in the future.

We are marking the ticket as resolved. If you have any queries, please feel free to get back to us.

For any further assistance, please reopen this ticket or reach out to us through our support channels, in the App or website, listed in the 'Need Help' section. 

Thank you for choosing PharmEasy. Have a great day ahead!

Regards,

notes.body: Hello Deepesh,    Greetings from PharmEasy!    We have received an update that the partner doctor had tried calling you multiple times; however, they were unable to connect with you.      A refund of Rs. 189.24 has been initiated to your account now. Post initiation, the refund will be credited to your source account within 3-5 business days. Please note that Saturday, Sunday, and bank holidays are not included in this.    For any further assistance, please reach out to us through our support channels on the app or website listed in the "Need Help" section.  Thank you for choosing PharmEasy. Stay Safe.  Regards, Grievance Officer HelpDesk.
notes.body_html:
Hello Deepesh,

Greetings from PharmEasy!

We have received an update that the partner doctor had tried calling you multiple times; however, they were unable to connect with you. 

A refund of Rs. 189.24 has been initiated to your account now. Post initiation, the refund will be credited to your source account within 3-5 business days. Please note that Saturday, Sunday, and bank holidays are not included in this. 

For any further assistance, please reach out to us through our support channels on the app or website listed in the "Need Help" section.

Thank you for choosing PharmEasy. Stay Safe.

Regards,
Grievance Officer HelpDesk.

helpdesk_ticket.description:
Dear PharmEasy Customer Support Team,
Grievance Redressal Department,
and Senior Management,

I am writing this email as a FINAL, URGENT, and HIGH-PRIORITY ESCALATION
regarding the severe mishandling and procedural lapses associated with my
order Order ID: 653726198280949760.

Please read this email carefully and completely, as every point mentioned
below is critical and requires immediate senior-level intervention.


---

1. Summary of the Issue – Missing and Wrong Medicines

I had ordered 5 medicines/products under this order ID.

However, during delivery:

I received only 2 items

Both items were wrong/incorrect medicines

The remaining 3 items were completely missing


This is not a minor operational error. In the pharmaceutical industry, such
mistakes are a serious breach of safety and accuracy, directly affecting
customer health and safety.


---

2. Incomplete and Procedurally Incorrect Investigation

I was informed that my complaint was closed after reviewing only the
dispatch video.

With due respect, I must state clearly:

A dispatch-level video alone is NOT a complete investigation.

A proper investigation requires:

CCTV footage from all hubs

Transit-level verification of the parcel

Sorting-center camera checks

Full chain-of-custody tracking

Weight log comparisons at every stage

Delivery station handover footage

Re-bagging and re-routing checks

Complete audit of all scan and movement logs


Closing a serious medicine-related complaint solely based on the dispatch
video is operationally incomplete, logically insufficient, and
professionally unacceptable.


---

3. Request for Full Chain-of-Custody Investigation

I formally request a complete and transparent multi-hub investigation,
including:

A. CCTV Footage Review (Mandatory)

Footage from:

Packing center

First sorting warehouse

All transit and routing hubs

Regional processing centers

Final delivery hub

Delivery station sorting & handover area


B. Verification of Weight Logs

Detailed comparison of:

Initial package weight at origin

Weight at each hub scan

Weight during re-bagging

Final delivery station weight


C. Movement & Scan Audit

Full audit of:

Outbound scans

Inbound scans at all hubs

Routing details

Sorting belt entries

Delivery executive pickup scans

Re-scan and re-routing logs



---

4. Transparency – Share Relevant CCTV Footage

Once the investigation is completed, I request that all relevant CCTV
footage, including packing, sorting, hub movement, and delivery station
handling, be shared with me for transparency. I have the full right to
verify how my parcel was handled at every stage.


---

5. Strong Red Flags Indicating Mishandling

Receiving wrong items, missing items, and incorrect quantity clearly
indicates:

Parcel mishandling during transit

Incorrect sorting or packing

Misrouting at a hub

Tampering or misplacement


Only a multi-hub, multi-stage investigation can identify the exact point of
failure.


---

6. Immediate and Suitable Resolution Expected

Given the seriousness of this issue, I expect one of the following
resolutions immediately:

✔ Option 1: Replacement – Provide all the correct medicines/products
originally ordered
OR
✔ Option 2: Full Refund – For all missing and incorrect items

A fair, customer-centric resolution is mandatory.


---

7. Urgent Actions Required

Please proceed with:

1. Reopening my complaint


2. Conducting a multi-hub chain-of-custody audit


3. Reviewing all relevant CCTV footage


4. Verifying weight logs and scan logs


5. Sharing relevant CCTV footage with me


6. Providing replacement or refund


7. Ensuring accountability across internal teams




---

8. Final Warning Before External Escalation

If this complaint is again closed without:

Complete CCTV review

Proper multi-hub investigation

Transparent, justified resolution


I will escalate the matter to:

PharmEasy Senior Executive Leadership

National Consumer Helpline (Government of India)

Consumer Court under Consumer Protection Act, 2019

Relevant pharmaceutical regulatory authorities

Any other legal forum as applicable


I hope PharmEasy resolves this matter immediately before external
escalation becomes necessary.


---

9. Conclusion

PharmEasy is expected to maintain the highest standards of:

Accuracy

Safety

Transparency

Operational integrity


All I seek is:

A complete and professional investigation

Transparent communication

A fair resolution (replacement or refund)



---

Final Statement (as requested):

You have wasted more than 10 days of my time on this issue. I cannot allow
any further delay. I expect a suitable resolution to be provided
immediately — without any further delay.


---

Warm regards,
Rohan

--

helpdesk_ticket.description_html:
Dear PharmEasy Customer Support Team,
Grievance Redressal Department,
and Senior Management,

I am writing this email as a FINAL, URGENT, and HIGH-PRIORITY ESCALATION regarding the severe mishandling and procedural lapses associated with my order Order ID: 653726198280949760.

Please read this email carefully and completely, as every point mentioned below is critical and requires immediate senior-level intervention.


---

1. Summary of the Issue – Missing and Wrong Medicines

I had ordered 5 medicines/products under this order ID.

However, during delivery:

I received only 2 items

Both items were wrong/incorrect medicines

The remaining 3 items were completely missing


This is not a minor operational error. In the pharmaceutical industry, such mistakes are a serious breach of safety and accuracy, directly affecting customer health and safety.


---

2. Incomplete and Procedurally Incorrect Investigation

I was informed that my complaint was closed after reviewing only the dispatch video.

With due respect, I must state clearly:

A dispatch-level video alone is NOT a complete investigation.

A proper investigation requires:

CCTV footage from all hubs

Transit-level verification of the parcel

Sorting-center camera checks

Full chain-of-custody tracking

Weight log comparisons at every stage

Delivery station handover footage

Re-bagging and re-routing checks

Complete audit of all scan and movement logs


Closing a serious medicine-related complaint solely based on the dispatch video is operationally incomplete, logically insufficient, and professionally unacceptable.


---

3. Request for Full Chain-of-Custody Investigation

I formally request a complete and transparent multi-hub investigation, including:

A. CCTV Footage Review (Mandatory)

Footage from:

Packing center

First sorting warehouse

All transit and routing hubs

Regional processing centers

Final delivery hub

Delivery station sorting & handover area


B. Verification of Weight Logs

Detailed comparison of:

Initial package weight at origin

Weight at each hub scan

Weight during re-bagging

Final delivery station weight


C. Movement & Scan Audit

Full audit of:

Outbound scans

Inbound scans at all hubs

Routing details

Sorting belt entries

Delivery executive pickup scans

Re-scan and re-routing logs



---

4. Transparency – Share Relevant CCTV Footage

Once the investigation is completed, I request that all relevant CCTV footage, including packing, sorting, hub movement, and delivery station handling, be shared with me for transparency. I have the full right to verify how my parcel was handled at every stage.


---

5. Strong Red Flags Indicating Mishandling

Receiving wrong items, missing items, and incorrect quantity clearly indicates:

Parcel mishandling during transit

Incorrect sorting or packing

Misrouting at a hub

Tampering or misplacement


Only a multi-hub, multi-stage investigation can identify the exact point of failure.


---

6. Immediate and Suitable Resolution Expected

Given the seriousness of this issue, I expect one of the following resolutions immediately:

✔ Option 1: Replacement – Provide all the correct medicines/products originally ordered
OR
✔ Option 2: Full Refund – For all missing and incorrect items

A fair, customer-centric resolution is mandatory.


---

7. Urgent Actions Required

Please proceed with:

1. Reopening my complaint


2. Conducting a multi-hub chain-of-custody audit


3. Reviewing all relevant CCTV footage


4. Verifying weight logs and scan logs


5. Sharing relevant CCTV footage with me


6. Providing replacement or refund


7. Ensuring accountability across internal teams




---

8. Final Warning Before External Escalation

If this complaint is again closed without:

Complete CCTV review

Proper multi-hub investigation

Transparent, justified resolution


I will escalate the matter to:

PharmEasy Senior Executive Leadership

National Consumer Helpline (Government of India)

Consumer Court under Consumer Protection Act, 2019

Relevant pharmaceutical regulatory authorities

Any other legal forum as applicable


I hope PharmEasy resolves this matter immediately before external escalation becomes necessary.


---

9. Conclusion

PharmEasy is expected to maintain the highest standards of:

Accuracy

Safety

Transparency

Operational integrity


All I seek is:

A complete and professional investigation

Transparent communication

A fair resolution (replacement or refund)



---

Final Statement (as requested):

You have wasted more than 10 days of my time on this issue. I cannot allow any further delay. I expect a suitable resolution to be provided immediately — without any further delay.


---

Warm regards,
Rohan

Regional processing centers

Final delivery hub

Delivery station sorting & handover area


B. Verification of Weight Logs

Detailed comparison of:

Initial package weight at origin

Weight at each hub scan

Weight during re-bagging

Final delivery station weight


C. Movement & Scan Audit

Full audit of:

Outbound scans

Inbound scans at all hubs

Routing details

Sorting belt entries

Delivery executive pickup scans

Re-scan and re-routing logs



---

4. Transparency – Share Relevant CCTV Footage

Once the investigation is completed, I request that all relevant CCTV footage, including packing, sorting, hub movement, and delivery station handling, be shared with me for transparency. I have the full right to verify how my parcel was handled at every stage.


---

5. Strong Red Flags Indicating Mishandling

Receiving wrong items, missing items, and incorrect quantity clearly indicates:

Parcel mishandling during transit

Incorrect sorting or packing

Misrouting at a hub

Tampering or misplacement


Only a multi-hub, multi-stage investigation can identify the exact point of failure.


---

6. Immediate and Suitable Resolution Expected

Given the seriousness of this issue, I expect one of the following resolutions immediately:

✔ Option 1: Replacement – Provide all the correct medicines/products originally ordered
OR
✔ Option 2: Full Refund – For all missing and incorrect items

A fair, customer-centric resolution is mandatory.


---

7. Urgent Actions Required

Please proceed with:

1. Reopening my complaint


2. Conducting a multi-hub chain-of-custody audit


3. Reviewing all relevant CCTV footage


4. Verifying weight logs and scan logs


5. Sharing relevant CCTV footage with me


6. Providing replacement or refund


7. Ensuring accountability across internal teams




---

8. Final Warning Before External Escalation

If this complaint is again closed without:

Complete CCTV review

Proper multi-hub investigation

Transparent, justified resolution


I will escalate the matter to:

PharmEasy Senior Executive Leadership

National Consumer Helpline (Government of India)

Consumer Court under Consumer Protection Act, 2019

Relevant pharmaceutical regulatory authorities

Any other legal forum as applicable


I hope PharmEasy resolves this matter immediately before external escalation becomes necessary.


---

9. Conclusion

PharmEasy is expected to maintain the highest standards of:

Accuracy

Safety

Transparency

Operational integrity


All I seek is:

A complete and professional investigation

Transparent communication

A fair resolution (replacement or refund)



---

Final Statement (as requested):

You have wasted more than 10 days of my time on this issue. I cannot allow any further delay. I expect a suitable resolution to be provided immediately — without any further delay.


---

Warm regards,
Rohan

Dear PharmEasy Customer Support Team,
Grievance Redressal Department,
and Senior Management,

I am writing this email as a FINAL, URGENT, and HIGH-PRIORITY ESCALATION
regarding the severe mishandling and procedural lapses associated with my
order Order ID: 653726198280949760.

Please read this email carefully and completely, as every point mentioned
below is critical and requires immediate senior-level intervention.


---

1. Summary of the Issue – Missing and Wrong Medicines

I had ordered 5 medicines/products under this order ID.

However, during delivery:

I received only 2 items

Both items were wrong/incorrect medicines

The remaining 3 items were completely missing


This is not a minor operational error. In the pharmaceutical industry, such
mistakes are a serious breach of safety and accuracy, directly affecting
customer health and safety.


---

2. Incomplete and Procedurally Incorrect Investigation

I was informed that my complaint was closed after reviewing only the
dispatch video.

With due respect, I must state clearly:

A dispatch-level video alone is NOT a complete investigation.

A proper investigation requires:

CCTV footage from all hubs

Transit-level verification of the parcel

Sorting-center camera checks

Full chain-of-custody tracking

Weight log comparisons at every stage

Delivery station handover footage

Re-bagging and re-routing checks

Complete audit of all scan and movement logs


Closing a serious medicine-related complaint solely based on the dispatch
video is operationally incomplete, logically insufficient, and
professionally unacceptable.


---

3. Request for Full Chain-of-Custody Investigation

I formally request a complete and transparent multi-hub investigation,
including:

Packing center

Final delivery hub

---

5. Strong Red Flags Indicating Mishandling

Receiving wrong items, missing items, and incorrect quantity clearly
indicates:

Parcel mishandling during transit

Incorrect sorting or packing

Misrouting at a hub

Tampering or misplacement


Only a multi-hub, multi-stage investigation can identify the exact point of
failure.


---

6. Immediate and Suitable Resolution Expected

Given the seriousness of this issue, I expect one of the following
resolutions immediately:

✔ Option 1: Replacement – Provide all the correct medicines/products
originally ordered
OR
✔ Option 2: Full Refund – For all missing and incorrect items

A fair, customer-centric resolution is mandatory.


---

7. Urgent Actions Required

Please proceed with:

1. Reopening my complaint


2. Conducting a multi-hub chain-of-custody audit


3. Reviewing all relevant CCTV footage


4. Verifying weight logs and scan logs

7. Ensuring accountability across internal teams




---

If this complaint is again closed without:

Complete CCTV review

Proper multi-hub investigation

Transparent, justified resolution


I will escalate the matter to:

PharmEasy Senior Executive Leadership

National Consumer Helpline (Government of India)

Consumer Court under Consumer Protection Act, 2019

Relevant pharmaceutical regulatory authorities

Any other legal forum as applicable


I hope PharmEasy resolves this matter immediately before external
escalation becomes necessary.


---

9. Conclusion

PharmEasy is expected to maintain the highest standards of:

Accuracy

Safety

Transparency

Operational integrity


All I seek is:

A complete and professional investigation

Transparent communication

A fair resolution (replacement or refund)



---

Final Statement (as requested):

You have wasted more than 10 days of my time on this issue. I cannot allow
any further delay. I expect a suitable resolution to be provided

Warm regards,
Rohan

notes.body: Hello Rupayan,       Greetings from PharmEasy!     Please be informed that we are unable to comply with his request to erase the data. We have to produce/show any or all transactions or interactions, past or present, when asked for by relevant government authorities. However, please confirm if you wish to deactivate your account.     Let me inform you that once the account is deactivated, we cannot process any requests or reactivate the account. Once confirmed, our team will reach out to complete the account deactivation process on the registered mobile number to confirm if you requested account deactivation.      If yes, OTP will be generated and will be sent to your registered mobile number. Once the OTP is shared by you with the team, they will go ahead and block the customer's account.      Awaiting your response.     Regards,  Sandhya Nackwal

notes.body: Hello Rupayan,     Greetings from PharmEasy!      I am sorry to hear that you wish to deactivate your PharmEasy account.    I have forwarded your account deactivation request to our escalations team. Let me inform you that, once the account is deactivated then we cannot process any request or reactivate the account. Once confirmed our team will reach out within 24 to 48 hours to complete the account deactivation process on a registered mobile number to confirm if you requested account deactivation.      If yes, an OTP will be generated and will be sent to your registered mobile number. Once the OTP is shared by you to the team, they will go ahead and block the customer's account.   Your patience and understanding are highly appreciated in the meantime.   Regards,  Neeha
notes.body_html:
Hello Rupayan,

Greetings from PharmEasy! 

I am sorry to hear that you wish to deactivate your PharmEasy account. 

I have forwarded your account deactivation request to our escalations team. Let me inform you that, once the account is deactivated then we cannot process any request or reactivate the account. Once confirmed our team will reach out within 24 to 48 hours to complete the account deactivation process on a registered mobile number to confirm if you requested account deactivation. 

If yes, an OTP will be generated and will be sent to your registered mobile number. Once the OTP is shared by you to the team, they will go ahead and block the customer's account.

Your patience and understanding are highly appreciated in the meantime.

Regards,
Neeha

As per update received from our team, our team member has called you however we are unable to establish contact with you.      Please be informed you that, for account deactivation process our team member will called you on a registered mobile number to confirm if you requested account deactivation. notes.body_html:
Hello Rupayan,

Greetings from team PharmEasy!
 
This email is with regards to your concern raised about account deactivation.

As per update received from our team, our team member has called you however we are unable to establish contact with you. 

Please be informed you that, for account deactivation process our team member will called you on a registered mobile number to confirm if you requested account deactivation. If yes, OTP will be generated and will be sent to your registered mobile number. Once the OTP will be shared by you to the team then will go ahead and block the customer's account. 

Let me inform you that, once the account is deactivated then we cannot process any request or reactivate the account. Once confirmed our team will reach out to complete the deactivation process.  

So we request you to kindly reach us back if you wish to deactivate your account.  
 
If you have any queries, please feel free to get back to us.
 
For any further assistance, please reopen this ticket or reach out to us through our support channels, in the App or website, listed in the 'Need Help' section.
 
Thank you for choosing PharmEasy. Have a great day ahead!
 
Regards,
PharmEasy

notes.body: Hello Prem,     Greetings from PharmEasy!         With regards to your order #658395198263537664-39904, I am sorry to know that you have received the wrong medicine. Please accept my sincere apologies for the inconvenience caused. As a token of apology, we have credited Rs.50 to your PharmEasy wallet.   I have raised a return request for 1 quantity of the wrong PHARMEASY VITAMIN B COMPLEX WITH FOLIC ACID - IMPROVES ENERGY - HEART & EYE HEALTH - BOTTLE OF 60. Please be informed, items that are opened, partially used, or disfigured are not eligible for returns. Items being returned should be in their original manufacturer’s packaging with labels and barcode intact.          The medicines will be collected within 24 hours from the day the request is raised. Once the medicine is returned, it will be verified by our partner retailer at the store. The refund amount of Rs. 235.90 will be processed and initiated within 48 hours. Also, once the refund is initiated, it will reflect in your payment source in 5 to 7 business days.    I appreciate your patience in the meantime.  ​   For any further assistance, please reach out to us through our support channels in the App or website listed in the Need Help section. Alternatively, you can also call us on 08071324888.     Thank you for choosing PharmEasy. Stay healthy!     Regards,  Habiba

With regards to your order #658395198263537664-39904, I am sorry to know that you have received the wrong medicine. Please accept my sincere apologies for the inconvenience caused. As a token of apology, we have credited Rs.50 to your PharmEasy wallet.

I have raised a return request for 1 quantity of the wrong PHARMEASY VITAMIN B COMPLEX WITH FOLIC ACID - IMPROVES ENERGY - HEART & EYE HEALTH - BOTTLE OF 60. Items being returned should be in their original manufacturer’s packaging with labels and barcode intact.

The medicines will be collected within 24 hours from the day the request is raised. Once the medicine is returned, it will be verified by our partner retailer at the store. For any further assistance, please reach out to us through our support channels in the App or website listed in the Need Help section. Alternatively, you can also call us on 08071324888.

Thank you for choosing PharmEasy. Stay healthy!

Habiba
